hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin VHOST=/var/www/vhosts/teeshop-dev.zhibek.com
# Sync latest git to vhost directory rsync -r --delete . $VHOST
# Drop existing DB (if it exists) & create new DB mysql -uroot -e "DROP DATABASE \`tee-shop\`" || true mysql -uroot -e "CREATE DATABASE \`tee-shop\`"
# Composer install cd $VHOST
# Set dev.install.xml to be active rm magento/app/etc/install.xml mv magento/app/etc/dev.install.xml magento/app/etc/install.xml
# Install & migrate ./deploy.sh
## Make the build folder rm build -rf || true mkdir build
# Clean up old Selenium processes pkill -f selenium-server 2>&1 || true pkill Xvfb 2>&1 || true
# Run Selenium Server export DISPLAY=:7.0 Xvfb :7 -ac -screen 0 1024x768x24 > /dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 2 java -jar ./selenium/selenium-server-standalone-2.37.0.jar -Dwebdriver.chrome.driver="/usr/bin/chromedriver" > /dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 2
# Run behat tests ./vendor/behat/behat/bin/behat --profile ci
# Move build files back to workspace cd $WORKSPACE rm build -rf || true mv $VHOST/build .
